item.title: Improve random forest performance using variable importance in R
item.description: tltr I fine-tune a random forest (RF) model using variable importance in R. I show how to use DALEX package to understand a random forest built with ranger package, simplify it, improve performance and run time. I use recipes package to handel categorical variables, missing values and novel levels. Variable importance Feature or variable importance letâ€™s you understand which features are important in a given machine learning model. Usually there is only a handful of variables that are important and you want to care about when building and understanding a model.
